title: Plan Open-Hole Wireline Logging Job
description: After a well has been drilled to total depth, a geologist plans a wireline logging job to get high-resolution data about the formations.

tasks.description: Select the suite of wireline logging tools to be run based on the data objectives (e.g., formation imaging, fluid sampling).
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of required logging tools is finalized.

tasks.description: Create a detailed logging program, specifying the order of tool runs and the depth intervals to be logged.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal logging program document is created.

tasks.description: Order the wireline logging services from a service company and coordinate their arrival at the rig site.
tasks.expected_outcome: The service company is booked, and their mobilization is scheduled.
